translations: 先验的；卓越的，[数] 超越的；超自然的

sentences.sentence: Few men have had such transcendental capacity to stir the heart of people.
sentences.translation: 很少人有如此超群出众的打动人心的才能。

sentences.sentence: Man has become the transcendental signified.
Now, this is supposed to be one sixth, but I know I don't want any transcendental numbers here.
sentences.translation: 现在，这是六分之一，但是,我知道我不想要任何的超越数。
